title: Friday Squid Blogging: Sunscreen from Squid Pigments

summary: The terrible pun in the headline is its own reward (or crime, depending), but I will say that I was moved to look out the office window because I heard an odd noise and couldn’t place what it was.  What it was: The hay baler, wrangling the hay bales into shape.  Ka-thunk, ka-thunk, ka-thunk...
title: Hay Bales Sling, Are You Listening
